1: Exile Island is a relaxed PvEvP 10x server. PvP is enabled at monuments and at the raidable bases!
Watch your back in those dangerous areas. However, everywhere else is a safe zone. You cannot be raided or looted.
Please type /discord in the chat to join! We need you to help us sort out any issues the server has. :)
2: Welcome back, {rank} {playername}! Thanks for coming back to Exile Island PvEvP!
We hope you enjoy your stay. Reach out to Clay in-game or on Discord for any comments, questions, or suggestions!
Let us know if you are experiencing any issues such as disconnection or otherwise. We strive for 0 issues!
3: So good to see you again, {rank} {playername}!
We truly value our return players, we need you to make the server a reality!
Please consider joining our discord by typing /discord in the chat! Rewards for verified accounts! (/auth)

Announcement List: Don't forget to join our discord! Verified members recieve benefits!
Type /discord for more info! After connected, type /auth in the in-game chat to receive you reward!
We want and need to hear your opinion and suggestions for the future of the PvExile Survival Server!
Exile Island is a relaxed PvEvP 10x server. PvP is enabled at monuments and at the raidable bases!
Watch your back in those dangerous areas. However, everywhere else is a safe zone. You cannot be raided or looted.
Please type /discord in the chat to join! We need you to help us sort out any issues the server has. :)
This is a brand-new server! We are working every day to improve your game experience!
By playing and joining the community, you are helping to build PvExile Survival from the ground up

Public Bradley APC Announcements.Destroyed With Destroyer Text: {playername} got the last shot on the APC destroying it!
Public Bradley APC Announcements.Spawn Text: An APC is patrolling the launch site!

Public Cargoship Announcements.Spawn Text: The Cargoship has been sighted off the coast!

Public Chinook Announcements.Crate Dropped Text: The Chinook has dropped a crate!
Public Chinook Announcements.Crate Dropped Text With Grid: The Chinook has dropped a crate in {grid}.
Public Chinook Announcements.Destroyed Text: The Chinook has been taken down!
Public Chinook Announcements.Destroyed Text With Destroyer: {playername} got the last shot on the Chinook taking it down!

Public Christmas Stocking Refill Announc.Text: Santa has refilled your stockings. Go check what you've got!

Public Helicopter Announcements.Despawn Text: The attack helicopter has left and it's now safe to come outdoors.
Public Helicopter Announcements.Destroyed Text: The patrol helicopter has been taken down!
Public Helicopter Announcements.Destroyed Text With Destroyer: {playername} got the last shot on the helicopter taking it down!
Public Helicopter Announcements.Spawn Text: Beware! The Attack Helicopter is inbound!

Public Join/Leave Announcements.Join Text: {rank} {playername} has joined the survivors on Exile Island.
Public Join/Leave Announcements.Leave Text: {rank} {playername} has departed Exile Island... for now.

Public Oil Rig Crate Hack Announcements.Hack Text: An oil rig crate is being hacked!
Public Oil Rig Crate Hack Announcements.Hack Text With Large Oil Rig: The large oil rig crate is being hacked!
Public Oil Rig Crate Hack Announcements.Hack Text With Small Oil Rig: The small oil rig crate is being hacked!

Public Restart Announcements.Cancelled Scheduled Restart Text: The restart in {time} has been cancelled.
Public Restart Announcements.Suspended Restart Text: The restart in {time} has been suspended.
